languages.text: {n}Блюстители снимают перчатки. Ни у одного из них на пальце нет перстня. У Хротко на мизинце виден след, как если бы на нем долго носили кольцо.{/n}

{n}The enforcers take off their gloves. Not one of them is wearing a ring. However, you do find a small mark on Hrotko's little finger, as if he had been wearing some sort of band on it for a long time.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Блюстители снимают перчатки. Ни у одного из них на пальце нет перстня. У Хротко на мизинце виден след, как если бы на нем долго носили кольцо.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The enforcers take off their gloves. None of them have a ring on their finger. Hrotko has a mark on his little finger, as if a ring had been worn on it for a long time.{/n}
{n}The enforcers take off their gloves. None of them have a ring on their finger. Hrotko has a mark on his little finger, as if a ring had been worn on it for a long time.{/n}

{n}The enforcers take off their gloves. Not one of them is wearing a ring; however, you do find a small mark on Hrotko's little finger, as if he had been wearing some sort of band on it for a long time.{/n}

{n}The enforcers take off their gloves. Not one of them is wearing a ring. However, you do find a small mark on Hrotko's little finger, as if he had been wearing some sort of band on it for a long time.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Enforcer legen ihre Handschuhe ab. Keiner von ihnen trägt einen Ring. Du erkennst aber einen Abdruck an Hrotkos kleinem Finger. Er scheint lange Zeit einen Ring getragen zu haben.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The enforcers take off their gloves. Not one of them is wearing a ring. However, you do find a small mark on Hrotko's little finger, as if he had been wearing some sort of band on it for a long time.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Enforcer legen ihre Handschuhe ab. Keiner von ihnen trägt einen Ring. Du erkennst aber einen Abdruck an Hrotkos kleinem Finger. Er scheint lange Zeit einen Ring getragen zu haben.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les prévôts retirent leurs gants, mais aucun d'entre eux ne porte de bague. Vous remarquez néanmoins une marque à peine visible sur l'auriculaire de Hrotko, comme s'il avait pendant longtemps arboré un anneau à cet endroit.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The enforcers take off their gloves. Not one of them is wearing a ring. However, you do find a small mark on Hrotko's little finger, as if he had been wearing some sort of band on it for a long time.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les prévôts retirent leurs gants, mais aucun d'entre eux ne porte de bague. Vous remarquez néanmoins une marque à peine visible sur l'auriculaire de Hrotko, comme s'il avait pendant longtemps arboré un anneau à cet endroit.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los guardias se quitan los guantes. Ni uno solo de ellos usa anillos. Sin embargo, distingues una fina marca en el dedo meñique de Hrotko, como si hubiese llevado algún tipo de sortija durante mucho tiempo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The enforcers take off their gloves. Not one of them is wearing a ring. However, you do find a small mark on Hrotko's little finger, as if he had been wearing some sort of band on it for a long time.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los guardias se quitan los guantes. Ni uno solo de ellos usa anillos. Sin embargo, distingues una fina marca en el dedo meñique de Hrotko, como si hubiese llevado algún tipo de sortija durante mucho tiempo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}エンフォーサーたちは手袋を外す。誰一人として指輪を着けてはいない。しかし、あなたはフロトコの小指に小さな跡を見つける。まるで長期間にわたって何らかの指輪を着けていたような。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The enforcers take off their gloves. Not one of them is wearing a ring. However, you do find a small mark on Hrotko's little finger, as if he had been wearing some sort of band on it for a long time.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}エンフォーサーたちは手袋を外す。誰一人として指輪を着けてはいない。しかし、あなたはフロトコの小指に小さな跡を見つける。まるで長期間にわたって何らかの指輪を着けていたような。{/n}

languages.text: {n}所有执法者都摘下了手套，没有人戴着戒指。不过，你在赫洛卡的小指上发现了一个小小的印记，看起来像是戴过某种柔软的饰品，戴了很久。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The enforcers take off their gloves. Not one of them is wearing a ring. However, you do find a small mark on Hrotko's little finger, as if he had been wearing some sort of band on it for a long time.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}所有执法者都摘下了手套，没有人戴着戒指。不过，你在赫洛卡的小指上发现了一个小小的印记，看起来像是戴过某种柔软的饰品，戴了很久。{/n}

languages.text: {n}İnfazcılar eldivenlerini çıkarıyor. Aralarından hiçbiri yüzük takmıyor. Ancak Hrotko'nun serçe parmağında küçük bir iz görüyorsun. Sanki uzun süre boyunca parmağına bir tür halka takmış gibi duruyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The enforcers take off their gloves. Not one of them is wearing a ring. However, you do find a small mark on Hrotko's little finger, as if he had been wearing some sort of band on it for a long time.{/n}
